Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Util::ComFailure::Code

Error Code.

Enumerator:
OK 

No error return value.

FAIL 
ABORT 
TRUNCATED 
NOT_FILLED 
FATAL 
NOROUTE 
NULL_SERVICE 
PANIC 
BAD_REQUEST 
NOT_IMPLEMENTED 
BAD_ADDRESS 
NO_CONNECTION 
BAD_PROTOCOL 
TIMEOUT 

operation has reach a timedout before finishing

ERR_PIPE 

Socket is closed or was closed during operation.

HOST_UNREACH 

Host unreachable.

HOST_NOTFOUND 

Host is not found.

HOST_NOTADDRESS 

Host is found but has no associated address.

ASYNC_POST 

Asynchronous post, used by asynchronous I/O.

LAST_CODE 

1 + last error code
